What would a hoax look like? First, as a hoax, there really wouldn't be people sick from the disease, or dying from it. The people in on the hoax could pretend to be sick, but they couldn't fill up hospitals unless all the medical people were in on it. Maybe this is possible in a few hospitals, but it is hard to see how it could be done in huge numbers of hospitals around the world. Second, if you tried to have the “patients” at only some hospitals in a region, how do you keep the staff at other hospitals from asking why they weren't seeing it at all? You would need willing or unwilling support from nearly everyone in a health role. Third, media of all sorts would just have to go to any hospital that was supposed to be overrun with patients, but wasn't to crack the whole hoax. Journalists and their relatives go to hospitals for their own needs. I think this means they all have to be in on it. Fourth, so do the coroners and funeral home workers who have to cover up for the fact that there aren't enough deaths. Remember the whole country is supposed to have a pretty big increase in total deaths. That's hard to fake. Fifth, you have a challenge with the general population in places that are supposed to have high rates wondering why they don't know anybody with the disease. Almost every government in the world would have to be in on it too. You may have seen a handful of people claiming to have evidence that this is a hoax, but for it to be a real hoax there would likely be millions of every nation and political alignment. I don't see how you do that.
